about_the_game:
A Double Sided Adult Dakimakura Illustrations.
Prepared for the main character: Melissa, showing her in a lingerie outfit and the nude.

Images included are high resolution 9000x3000 pixels in size.
N.b. these dakimakuras cannot be resold or put to commercial use in other properties and are for private use only.

Once installed a folder will appear in the game directory called 'DLC - Dakimakura 2' with the .png Dakimakura images included within.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains explicit sexually suggestive images and nudity.
